strapiPost.title: Weekend Roundup
strapiPost.content:
Happy Friday! Let's see if we can help you with some weekend plans:

  • Cycle: The UCI Cyclo-Cross World Championship is all weekend, and you won't want to miss it.
  • Live: Every Friday The Taproom in Bentonville has live music. Go get a drink or two and maybe hear something new!
  • Pro fight: Crown Championship Wrestling is going down on Saturday in Siloam Springs.
  • Move your feet: Attend a Latin dance social at Moonbroch tonight in Rogers.
  • Swing your hips: Another dancing event where you can learn from the best is happening in Rogers right around the corner.
  • Peruse: The indoor farmers market will be at Record again this Saturday.
  • Concert: General admission for Ludacris at JJ's Live on Saturday is still available.

That's all from us for this weekend, folks! Have fun, be creative, and see you Monday!
